CustomField.description: Tax exemption certificate for the account. We recommend that you use the tax exemption features of Avalara. Use this field only when you are not required to collect tax for the account and your finance team tracks and verifies tax exemption certificates manually.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tax exemption certificate for the account. Enter a value if you are not required to collect tax for the account and your finance team tracks and verifies tax exemption certificates manually.
CustomField.label: Exemption Certificate
